trans-unit.source: This article shows you how to [task], using commands from both the Azure module and the Azure Resource Manager module.
trans-unit.target: This article shows you how to [task], using commands from both the Azure module and the Azure Resource Manager module.

trans-unit.source: This is intended to help you learn the new commands as well as migrate existing scripts to the new commands.
trans-unit.target: This is intended to help you learn the new commands as well as migrate existing scripts to the new commands.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisite: Install a Recent Version of Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Prerequisite: Install a Recent Version of Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: If you haven't done so already, install at least the [version number] version of Azure PowerShell on your local computer.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't done so already, install at least the [version number] version of Azure PowerShell on your local computer.

trans-unit.source: If you use an earlier version, it won't have the Azure Resource Manager cmdlets described in this article.
trans-unit.target: If you use an earlier version, it won't have the Azure Resource Manager cmdlets described in this article.

trans-unit.source: [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](install-configure-powershell.md) for instructions on setting up Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](install-configure-powershell.md) for instructions on setting up Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: [Using Windows PowerShell with Resource Manager](powershell-azure-resource-manager.md) for basics on using Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: [Using Windows PowerShell with Resource Manager](powershell-azure-resource-manager.md) for basics on using Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Most tasks require you to use an administrator-level Azure PowerShell command prompt.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Most tasks require you to use an administrator-level Azure PowerShell command prompt.
